title: Me whenever I use Pentakill Mordekaiser

replies.body:
Penta Morde + Taric botlane. 

Shirts vs Skins
add {{champion:201}} {{champion:110}} makes it skins vs skins
Oooh my.  Would love that  skin on skin contact.
throw Pool party {{champion:104}} in that mix and 10/10
Oglaf?! And you even cropped out the naughty bits! Well done!

> [{quoted}](name=Quort,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=XvOunkIu,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-05-20T01:03:45.841+0000)
>
> Oglaf?! And you even cropped out the naughty bits! Well done!

So happy more people know about that comic, 'cause I always feel like it's both great but inappropriate to bring up randomly in conversation.
Ah, a fellow person of taste I see
I demand slutty armor for everyone in league of legends (except Amumu, Annie, Zoe. Lulu, and Nunu)!

So does that mean Willump (the yeti Nunu rides), Blitz, Orianna, Bristles (I think that's the name of Sej's boar), Kalista, Brand, and the other non-human champions (Bard, Anivia, Aurelion Sol, etc) will get slutty armor? What does a pig's slutty armor look like? (And no, if you find any picture of what slutty boar armor looks like, do NOT link it to me. PLS and thank you)
thanks to furies you put sluty armor on anything
Lulu already pole dances, It would be so fitting though!
These are the post i like to see.
The enemy will effectively be blinded by the majestic abs, rendering them as useless as the armor iteself.
